From: KSLawdogg@...

IGL Staff:



A hatch that seems to appear out of nowhere opens up in the thirty foot 
barricade that seperates the spectators from the potentially dangerous 
combatants.  Several armed humanoids come out, a few unarmed ones following 
carrying some equipment.

The guards move to get between Epyon and Bruiser, in case Epyon tries to 
finish Bruiser off.  The unarmed humanoids begin quick repairs, in a few 
minutes they successfully clot the leaking of mech-fluid from his severed 
limb and reattach the leg.  They continue with the repairs, not bothering to 
answer his question.  

Over the loudspeaker, the victor is announced;  

"Congratulations to Epyon, victor of this bout and the first fighter to win 
his match in this year's Round One.  With such a quick win, it will no doubt 
bring him many fans.  Remember everyone, the IGL is brought to you by Trees.  
They're everywhere."
